channel.title: Local Hosting :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Resources for setting up a locally hosted workshop environment.

item.title: Local Hosting with Multipass
item.description: Learn how to create a local hosting environment with Multipass - Windows/Linux/Mac(Intel)

item.title: Local Hosting with OrbStack
item.description: Learn how to create a local hosting environment with OrbStack - Mac (Apple Silicon)

item.title: Running Demo-in-a-Box
item.description: Learn how to use Demo-in-a-Box to manage demos and otel collectors in an easy-to-use web interface.
